headline: Diamond has cause my breakups - says Eric Omondi's wife
author: QUEEN SEREM
description: Tanzanian socialite Gigy Money was featured on Eric Omondi's wife material
articleBody:
Tanzanian socialite Gigy Money says singer Diamond Platnumz has made her break up with a lot of men. Gigy Money came into the Kenyan spotlight after she caused drama at the Eric Omondi scripted show 'Wife Material'.

Speaking to the media over the weekend, Money said that being a fan of the Wasafi CEO has cost her many of her relationships.

"I have dumped so many men because of Diamond. So many of them including a Nigerian. We even fought (with the Nigerian man) because he felt I was being invited to everything that concerned Diamond."

When asked whether Diamond is serious with his own love life, she said;

"He is the problem, that man wants to also be with old women, young and old, it gets to a point where he doesn't want the fame and the name. He meets thousands of women out there and when he gets to talk to them, he doesn't get to like them because women are character and not looks."

She went on to ask women to give the bongo star a break from relationships.

headline: Vera Sidika shares last moments with dead pal (Screenshots)
author: GRACE KERONGO
description: Vera Sidika mourned, "Just that night before the sad news we were planning your visit to come to see Asia again. OMG Sally, I have been having sad moments trying to figure out why you have to go."
articleBody:
Socialite Vera Sidika has released a number of screenshots of WhatsApp messages between her and her late friend Sally Empresal.

Vera is mourning the sudden death of Sally.

She paid a moving tribute saying,"Such a beautiful soul gone too soon. Sally moved her daughter's birthday party date twice to a different date just so she could attend my baby shower. Such friends are rare, honestly. I don't know why it had to be like this."

She continued, "Sally loved Asia like crazy. She went all out for her. I'm so sad she really didn't get to hear Asia call her aunty. Life is so unfair. Sally, please come back to us."

Adding, "My baby please come back to us. God, life is so unfair. why?

Vera reminisced, "You met Asia right before she was born and went crazy at how beautiful she is. Just that night before the sad news we were planning your visit to come to see Asia again. OMG Sally, I have been having sad moments trying to figure out why you have to go."

Ever since she heard the news, everything reminds Vera of Sally.

"God why such a pure soul is taken from us. The past two days have been hard, while changing Asia and seeing these I break down. Sally loved Asia like crazy. She went all out for her. I’m so sad she really didn’t get to hear Asia call her aunty. Life is so unfair.

Life is too short. Lets embrace and cherish the ones we love on a daily. Nobody knows tomorrow."

She confessed,"I might not have known you for years but the one year truly felt like 10 years of friendship, you were an amazing pure soul, Sally. I love you. Asia loves you so much. we will forever celebrate you. This is a celebration of a life well lived."

Check out the screenshots of her last WhatsApp messages with Sally on their plans to meet.

headline: Mother attends her graduation 4 hours after giving birth
author: Mpasho
description: The new mom detailed how her pregnancy journey was a tough one as she contracted Covid-19.
articleBody:
A lady from Florida managed to beat the odds by attaining her PHD hours after giving birth.

Queshonda Kudaisi gave birth to her daughter on the day of her graduation, and hours later, she was dressed in a gown ready to receive her award.

The new mom detailed how her pregnancy journey was a tough one as she contracted Covid-19.

"In August I contracted COVID while pregnant. I thought the baby and I wouldn't survive, or that I would have to push back my graduation. However, yesterday proved me wrong.

I was discharged from the hospital with a healthy baby girl at 12pm and attended graduation at 6 pm #PhDMom," she shared.

The new mum identifies herself as a Math Coach and Advocate 4 Equity & Justice.

headline: (Video) Nameless and Milly Chebby excite Kenyans with suggestive dance
author: Rotter Mbuthia
description: For those who weren't able to attend the humongous Sauto Sol concert this past weekend, there were many other events that one could choose from.
articleBody:
For those who weren't able to attend the humongous Sauto Sol concert this past weekend, there were many other events that one could choose from.

One of those was the Afrovasha concert that took place in Naivasha that featured artistes such as AliKiba, Harmonize, Nameless and Wahu.

The event was also a hit showing that Kenyans can support multiple concerts at different venues on such a packed weekend.

One of the highlights of the concert was Nameless and Milly Chebby dancing together. This happened after Nameless who was performing spotted Terence Creative's wife in the crowd before proceeding to dance with her.

headline: Arrow Bwoy reveals when he will get a baby with Nadia
author: Rotter Mbuthia
description: Arrow Bwoy and Nadia Mukami went public with their relationship in August this year. Since then the two have been in sync and have been gaga over each other.
articleBody:
Arrow Bwoy and Nadia Mukami went public with their relationship in August this year. Since then the two have been in sync and have been gaga over each other.

Words like 'marriage' and 'pregnancy' have circulated around the couple since they made that announcement.

These are phrases that the couple has been smart in handling with vague responses that keep the fans guessing, making sure the hype surrounding them doesn't die down.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Young King 👑 (@arrowbwoy)

But it seems that sometimes a firm denial is needed, something that Arrow decided to do, on his Instastories.

The man decided to engage in a Q and A with his fans and followers where a fan had asked him whether the 'Wangu' singer was with child?

Arrow Bwoy was quick to deal with that question asking the fan, where they had heard such a thing? In fact, he added that they would get a kid in 3 years as they were using family planning.

Last month, Arrow Bwoy hinted that he could see himself in a marriage with Nadia, saying,

“I feel I’ve gotten myself a special person. The wedding will come at its own time. What matters right now is that there’s a good vibe between me and her,” Arrow said during Nadia’s birthday bash.

“We are young lovers, we make mistakes every day and we learn from our mistakes. Time will come,” he said.

headline: 'For the 1st time in my entire life, I feel safe,' Eve D'Souza
author: Rotter Mbuthia
description: In a recent interview, she did with one of the local publications, Eve D'Souza opened up on her permanent move to Dubai that happened last year.
articleBody:
In a recent interview, she did with one of the local publications, Eve D'Souza opened up on her permanent move to Dubai that happened last year.

The ex-radio presenter and actress moved with her hubby, Simon in December 2020, a move that she was at first concerned about, saying,

"When the pandemic made travel difficult, we made the decision to relocate. I never thought I would love living in Dubai as much as I do. I was apprehensive at first as I thought it would be too ‘glitz and glam’ and a superficial type of lifestyle that I was very uncomfortable adapting to. I am pleasantly surprised at how comfortable, but down to earth, our life is here."

headline: 'Doctors tried saving my eye with no success,' Daddy Owen
author: PENINAH WAMBUI
description: They did several surgeries to correct my eye to no avail, but they managed to remove the white 'stuff' so my eye now looks normal but it doesn't see.
articleBody:
Award-winning Kenyan gospel artiste has shared a failed attempt to 'correct' his eye after it got injured during a beating by mob justice.

At the time Owen had not yet given his life to Christ.

Sharing his experience during Malaika Tribute Award, Owen shared, "This event is personal for me because I lost my eye in 2001, it was challenging as people would look at me differently.

I met a white guy who asked what happened and I told him. He asked me what happened to my eye and when I did he told me to go to Kikuyu hospital.

They did several surgeries to correct my eye to no avail, but they managed to remove the white 'stuff' so my eye now looks normal but it doesn't see.

I see using one eye."

Owen added, "After that, I could relate to how people with disabilities are looked upon by society. People would look at me differently whenever I entered a room or a matatu."

Malaika tribute is an event held to appreciate people living with disabilities and are making great impact in society.

headline: Kenyan journalists throw an end of year party (Photos)
author: FRIDAH NALIAKA
description: The outdoor event brought together hundreds of journalists in Print, Online and Broadcast media and those practicing Public Relations.
articleBody:
• The outdoor event brought together hundreds of journalists in Print, Online and Broadcast media and those practicing Public Relations.

Kenyan journalists were treated to a lavish end of year party.

The annual Scribes End of Year Party took place this weekend in Kajiado.

The outdoor event brought together hundreds of journalists in Print, Online and Broadcast media and those practicing Public Relations.

This year’s event was sponsored by Amnesty International and Media Council of Kenya among others.

This year's Scribes End of Year Party theme was Protection of Journalists for a Peaceful Election.

Chief Guest Amnesty International Kenya Executive Director Irũngũ Houghton, addressed the scribes through a video message, maintaining that the media plays a critical role in any democratic elections.

The party which started Saturday afternoon went all the way to the wee hours of Sunday morning, with journalists enjoying Nyama Choma and dancing their souls out.

Here are photos from the party.

headline: How Actress Aisha Mwajumlah landed role in Pete series
author: FRIDAH NALIAKA
description: Hers was a coincidence since the role had already been given to someone else who pulled out of the deal at the last minute.
articleBody:
Actress Aisha Mwajumlah has become a household name due to her role in the Pete series on Maisha Magic.

Known by her stage name Nimimi, Aisha is a trained Journalist with a passion in film.

Mpasho caught up with the actress during the 11th Edition of Kalasha Awards where she shared how she landed her role in the Pete series.

"I had come to Nairobi to audition for a show then I got a call from my manager. She told me to go back to Mombasa as she wanted me to audition for a role. I got to Mombasa, auditioned on Wednesday and I was on set on Friday," Aisha shared.

She added that hers was a coincidence since the role had already been given to someone else who pulled out of the deal at the last minute.

"It was a role that had already been cast but things happened behind the scenes and the cast was not available."

The actress added that the producer of the film was afraid that they might not meet her budget, but this was not the case.

Aisha also spoke about losing Mzee Siri, who was a cast in the Pete film.

headline: 'I am not able to surprise her,' DJ Mo on gifting Pastor Size 8
author: ELIZABETH NGIGI
description: DJ Mo said, "I am wondering what I will give her since the things people surprise their women with, she already has, kama ni gari, ako nayo etc so I have to find a unique way to do it."
articleBody:
Gospel spinmaster DJ Mo is proud of his celebrity wife Size 8 after her .

On Sunday, he expressed excitement after his wife was ordained as a pastor.

On his social media, the father of two heaped praise on the mother of his beautiful children.

"I will support you in your ministry babe. I admire your love for God. Today is your day to be ordained as a pastor and I am proud of you. Congratulations to everyone else who got this pastoral ordination," he wrote.

Speaking to Mpasho, Mo said he is still researching the best gift for his wife.

" I am not able to surprise her today since we have two events but I am researching on the best gift to give her. It's actually a good feeling since I am not going in that line, Mkingoja nikue pastor, itakua ngumu but I will support.

I am wondering what I will give her since the things people surprise their women with, she already has, kama ni gari, ako nayo etc so I have to find a unique way to do it."

Asked if they will hold a white wedding, Mo said they had a private wedding.

headline: Charlene Ruto steps out looking snatched after welcoming baby (Photo)
author: GRACE KERONGO
description: Charlene Ruto who is the Director of PR and Branding at Weston Hotel Nairobi, welcomed a baby a few months back.
articleBody:
Daughter of deputy president William Ruto today stepped out looking all sorts of stunning for the Jamuhuri Day celebrations held at Uhuru Garden.

Charlene Ruto who is the Director of PR and Branding at Weston Hotel Nairobi welcomed a baby a few months back.

She stepped out in a black high-low skater dress for the national celebration event. Charlene paid her look with a pair of nude coloured heels.

A source whispered to Mpasho the exciting news saying, "The grandparents as super jazzed with the arrival of the little angel. This is their first grandchild."

Adding, "Rachel Ruto has been spending so much time with her grandchild and very enamoured with the newborn."

Charlene's child is four months old now.

Coincidentally, the Jubilee duo of president Uhuru Kenyatta and his deputy Ruto became grandparents within the same month.

Uhuru's only daughter, Ngina Kenyatta welcomed her first child in mid-September at the Aga Khan hospital.

headline: New twist as DPP orders prosecution of Murgor sisters in Ndichu twins assault case
author: CYRUS OMBATI
description: The ODPP had on November 17 ordered the twins be charged with assault and malicious damage to property.
articleBody:
A new twist emerged in a case in which two techie brothers are accused of assault and malicious damage, when the accusers were ordered to also take plea.

The Office of the Director of Public Prosecution on December 9 ordered one of the two sisters- Stephanie, 24 and her sister Cheryl Murgor 22, be charged with fighting in public and assault.

This is in a case where the two have accused twin brothers Edward and Paul Ndichu of assaulting them and maliciously damaging their car.

The ODPP had on November 17 ordered the twins be charged with assault and malicious damage to property.

But the plea taking was delayed awaiting the processing of a new complaint by a woman- Munyra Hassan Mohamed- who was also involved in the scuffle when the said assault happened on October 17 at the Emara Ole Sereni Hotel, Nairobi.

The two sisters are now expected to appear in court on December 14 for possible plea taking, their lawyer and uncle Philip Murgor said.

“The ladies are ready. We will be in court. The police contacted us with the unfortunate news and we are set. The girls want justice,” he said.

It is not clear when the Ndichu brothers will take plea as directed by the ODPP on November 17.

Their lawyer Edwin Sifuna said they were ready for any eventuality.

And following the developments, the Federation of Women Lawyers –Kenya (Fida) has protested the manner in which the probe was conducted.

Fida wrote to the ODPP’s Joseph Riungu who is in charge of Nairobi, saying they are representing Stephanie and Cheryl.

Executive director Annie Ireri said the two women’s rights had been blatantly disregarded and overlooked despite the compelling evidence provided by their clients to carry out proper investigations and charge the perpetrators with the correct offence as per the Penal Code.

“Instead, we have been issued with baseless counter accusations against our clients which we take issue with,” she said.

Ireri said Fida is dissatisfied with the outcome of the investigation process so far and would like a review of the matter to understand the circumstances surrounding by the DPP to exercise its mandate.

“Particularly, Fida-Kenya would like to register its concern over investigation process being carried out on the alleged assault,” the letter read in part.

Murgor has been protesting the delay in charging the two brothers even after the ODPP ordered their prosecution.

The two sisters reported the matter and recorded further statements and narrated their ordeal on the day to the police before they were issued with a P3 form.

The officers also recorded a statement from a witness in the case who was also assaulted in the drama and issued him with a P3.

They also obtained official records of the M-Pesa transaction between the Ndichu brothers and Samuel Ramdas whose car was damaged.

The team also inspected the car that was damaged during the drama at the hotel, which was photographed by the Scenes of Crime Personnel.

Police officers who attended the scene also recorded their statements. They also obtained CCTV footage of the drama.

The two women run a designer clothesline in the city. They said they were attending a wedding after-party at the hotel on the 10th floor and were accompanied by two friends Samuel Ramdas and Patrick Koech.

At about 2.30 am, one of the twin brothers allegedly made an improper pass at Stephanie to which she told him she knows him as a husband to media personality Janet Mbugua. Munyra who was with the brothers shouted ex-husband.

When Stephanie left for the exit one of the brothers verbally assaulted her and abused her.

At the entrance, one of the brothers violently broke the right-hand door side mirror while the other one broke the left-hand side one before they again went to attack Cheryl.

Cheryl fought back and based on this, she is set to take plea.

The twins then pleaded to pay for the damage of the car mirrors and a dent at Sh110,000.

“One of the brothers proceeded to pay via M-PESA after which they both went back to the hotel. However immediately thereafter, the transaction was reversed. At no point did the young ladies accept any compensation for the assault or injury to themselves,” Murgor said.

Paul and Eddie have noted that they do not condone or support violence against women and that on the night of the incident, they did not assault any woman as widely claimed.

The brothers lost the support of one of the investors in their company Wapi Pay.

They also resigned from the company following the drama.

The investors Kepple Africa Venture revealed they will withdraw their funding from the tech firm after its co-founders, the Ndichu brothers, were accused of assaulting women.

In reaction, the Chinese investor revealed that they will cut ties with the company owned by the two brothers.

This has prompted the brothers to launch a campaign to restore their image online.
articleBodyHtml:
A new twist emerged in a case in which two techie brothers are accused of assault and malicious damage, when the accusers were ordered to also take plea.

The Office of the Director of Public Prosecution on December 9 ordered one of the two sisters- Stephanie, 24 and her sister Cheryl Murgor 22, be charged with fighting in public and assault.

This is in a case where the two have accused twin brothers Edward and Paul Ndichu of assaulting them and maliciously damaging their car.

The ODPP had on November 17 ordered the twins be charged with assault and malicious damage to property.

But the plea taking was delayed awaiting the processing of a new complaint by a woman- Munyra Hassan Mohamed- who was also involved in the scuffle when the said assault happened on October 17 at the Emara Ole Sereni Hotel, Nairobi.

The two sisters are now expected to appear in court on December 14 for possible plea taking, their lawyer and uncle Philip Murgor said.

“The ladies are ready. We will be in court. The police contacted us with the unfortunate news and we are set. The girls want justice,” he said.

It is not clear when the Ndichu brothers will take plea as directed by the ODPP on November 17.

Their lawyer Edwin Sifuna said they were ready for any eventuality.

And following the developments, the Federation of Women Lawyers –Kenya (Fida) has protested the manner in which the probe was conducted.

Fida wrote to the ODPP’s Joseph Riungu who is in charge of Nairobi, saying they are representing Stephanie and Cheryl.

Executive director Annie Ireri said the two women’s rights had been blatantly disregarded and overlooked despite the compelling evidence provided by their clients to carry out proper investigations and charge the perpetrators with the correct offence as per the Penal Code.

“Instead, we have been issued with baseless counter accusations against our clients which we take issue with,” she said.

Ireri said Fida is dissatisfied with the outcome of the investigation process so far and would like a review of the matter to understand the circumstances surrounding by the DPP to exercise its mandate.

“Particularly, Fida-Kenya would like to register its concern over investigation process being carried out on the alleged assault,” the letter read in part.

Murgor has been protesting the delay in charging the two brothers even after the ODPP ordered their prosecution.

The two sisters reported the matter and recorded further statements and narrated their ordeal on the day to the police before they were issued with a P3 form.

The officers also recorded a statement from a witness in the case who was also assaulted in the drama and issued him with a P3.

They also obtained official records of the M-Pesa transaction between the Ndichu brothers and Samuel Ramdas whose car was damaged.

The team also inspected the car that was damaged during the drama at the hotel, which was photographed by the Scenes of Crime Personnel.

Police officers who attended the scene also recorded their statements. They also obtained CCTV footage of the drama.

The two women run a designer clothesline in the city. They said they were attending a wedding after-party at the hotel on the 10th floor and were accompanied by two friends Samuel Ramdas and Patrick Koech.

At about 2.30 am, one of the twin brothers allegedly made an improper pass at Stephanie to which she told him she knows him as a husband to media personality Janet Mbugua. Munyra who was with the brothers shouted ex-husband.

When Stephanie left for the exit one of the brothers verbally assaulted her and abused her.

At the entrance, one of the brothers violently broke the right-hand door side mirror while the other one broke the left-hand side one before they again went to attack Cheryl.

Cheryl fought back and based on this, she is set to take plea.

The twins then pleaded to pay for the damage of the car mirrors and a dent at Sh110,000.

“One of the brothers proceeded to pay via M-PESA after which they both went back to the hotel. However immediately thereafter, the transaction was reversed. At no point did the young ladies accept any compensation for the assault or injury to themselves,” Murgor said.

Paul and Eddie have noted that they do not condone or support violence against women and that on the night of the incident, they did not assault any woman as widely claimed.

The brothers lost the support of one of the investors in their company Wapi Pay.

They also resigned from the company following the drama.

The investors Kepple Africa Venture revealed they will withdraw their funding from the tech firm after its co-founders, the Ndichu brothers, were accused of assaulting women.

In reaction, the Chinese investor revealed that they will cut ties with the company owned by the two brothers.

This has prompted the brothers to launch a campaign to restore their image online.

headline: DJ Mo speaks on Willy Paul and Diana Marua drama
author: ELIZABETH NGIGI
description: Speaking to Mpasho.co.ke, Mo said it is wise to choose what you say and when you say it.
articleBody:
DJ Mo has responded to the ongoing drama in the music industry. A few days back, Diana Marua made explosive allegations against Willy Paul in a video that has since gone viral.

She claims that Pozee kidnapped her in his car, choked her and attempted to rape her.

Defending himself, Pozee claims that he slid into her DM and asked to meet her and she showed up and it was a date of sorts.

Well, DJ Mo has given his take on the entire drama.

Speaking to Mpasho.co.ke, Mo said it is wise to choose what you say and when you say it.

"As a celebrity, you are the mirror of so many people in the society. Before you speak anything, make sure you have thought about the repercussions," DJ Mo said.

The spinmaster and entrepreneur was speaking during the event where his wife, Size 8 was being ordained as a preacher at JCC Thika. He said he is proud that his wife chose the path of Christ.

The proud hubby said, "I will be there for her by all means."

headline: Size 8 weighs in on Willy Paul and Diana Marua saga
author: ELIZABETH NGIGI
description: Size 8 weighed in on Willy Paul who is dealing with sexual misconduct allegations against him by Diana Marua.
articleBody:
Gospel singer Size 8 is officially a pastor.

She was ordained into the ministry at JCC Thika at the event attended by her loved ones and a number of celebrities Like Lady B, DK Kwenye Beat and Kabi wa Jesus.

Speaking about it she told Mpasho, " My relationship with Kabi wa Jesus is that they are close friends."

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Mpasho News (@mpashogram)

Asked about one of her close pals, Willy Paul who is dealing with sexual misconduct allegations against him by Diana Marua, Size 8 said, " I have not heard anything about him trending. I have been fasting all through."

Size 8 said that the only conversation they had was over a music project dubbed 'Lenga'.

She continued, "My inspiration is how God loves me and he has never judged me. What's keeps me going is my faith and my reliability on God."

This comes after Willy Pal went live on Youtube last night and wept bitter tears saying the allegations will kill his career and that he did nothing wrong.

Speaking to Weezdom, Willy Paul said, "What hurts me about this story is that my friends have also joined hands to finish me," He said wiping tears.

"They have joined hands and they are people I have worked with. What I don't understand is why some would sit down and lie and then get to the point where they incite others to join it. Since they don't have evidence they incite others and in Kenya today a woman is believed and listened to more. I have never been broken down ...but this has brought me down."

headline: 'My intention is not bad,' Karen Nyamu speaks on her relationship with Samidoh
author: FRIDAH NALIAKA
description: "I know i am not a home breaker, my intention is not bad. It is not something good." - Karen Nyamu
articleBody:
Lawyer Karen Nyamu has opened up on her relationship with Mugithi singer Samidoh.

In an interview with Eve, Karen Nyamu addressed a past incident where she accused Samidoh of physically assaulting her.

The lawyer said she decided to go public on the issue since she felt the need to speak up against the violence.

"We encourage women to speak when they go through some incidences, in the spark of the moment, I saw it was important to speak about my experience. It was very shocking for me," Karen said.

The mother of two also spoke on how she copes with online bullies, who accuse her of being a homewrecker.

"I know myself, there is no way you can coment a lie about me and it affects me. I know i am not a home breaker, my intention is not bad. It is not something good, but it is a situation we found ourselves in."

Karen said she relates well with Samidoh as her friend and also the father of her son.

she said.

headline: 'Salute Sauti Sol!' Konshens praises boy band
author: Rotter Mbuthia
description: Konshens is really doing all the right things as far as trying to butter up his Kenyan fans before his December 31st concert.The Jamaican dancehall
articleBody:
Konshens is really doing all the right things as far as trying to butter up his Kenyan fans before his December 31st concert.

The Jamaican dancehall musician has praised his Kenyan band, Sauti Sol after their successful concert on Sunday, arguably the biggest in Kenya this year.

The 'Gal a bubble' singer complimented the band on his Twitter page writing,

'Just really great homegrown Kenyan artistes giving a really great show to a really great sold out audience. Salute @sautisol.'

headline: Love brewed in incest: Man sentenced for 10 years
author: KNA by Ann Salaton/ Vivian Achieng
authorsList: KNA by Ann Salaton/ Vivian Achieng
description: The Court had been informed that the couple had gone to the victim's family for introductions only to learn that they originate from the same clan.
articleBody:
A 25-year-old man who killed his fiancée at Kuto village in Narok South Sub-county has been sentenced to serve 10 years imprisonment after he was found guilty of manslaughter.

Boaz Kirui, had earlier been charged with murder but prayed the court for the charge to be substituted with a lesser offense, a request the Court granted.

The prosecution side said they had no objection if the offender was released on a non-custodial sentence.

However, while sentencing the accused, Narok High Court Judge Justice, Francis Gikonyo, said the convict could not benefit from a non-custodial sentence, owing to the seriousness of the offense.

The Court heard that the convict had reconciled with the victim's family since they all hail from the same clan.

Kirui was charged on November 29, 2019 with the murder of his girlfriend after their families opposed their intention to get married since the two lovers originated from the same clan.

He admitted having committed the offense, saying he reacted violently to the decision that he could not get married to the girl he loved too much because it is a taboo to marry from the same clan.

The Court had been informed that the couple had gone to the victim's family for introductions only to learn that they originate from the same clan, and as they walked out of the house, Kirui stabbed the girl with a sharp penknife killing her on the spot.

In mitigation, Kirui pleaded with the Court for a lenient sentence, saying his action was prompted by his passionate love for the deceased and vowed never to repeat such a crime again.

A post-mortem examination carried out on the body by Government pathologist, Dr. Mutai Langat, showed that the victims' death was caused by severe chest injury.

While reading the sentence, Justice Gikonyo said there was enough evidence to prove that the young man had stabbed to death his fiancée.

circumstances surrounding the matter, Justice Gikonyo, sentenced Kirui to 10 years imprisonment.

headline: Its going down! Photos and Video from Sol Fest
author: FRIDAH NALIAKA
description: Fans turned up in huge numbers to witness performances from top artists.
articleBody:
The Sol Fest concert is ongoing at the Carnivore grounds in Nairobi.

Fans turned up in huge numbers to witness performances from top artists.

So far, DJ Set, The Only Rosa, Maandy, and Wakadinali have performed.

Next in line is Femi One, Chris Kaiga, Bensoul, Nviiri the Storyteller, and finally, the men of the day- Sauti Sol.

The event is in partnership with Radio Africa Group, Homeboyz entertainment and other partners.

headline: Photos: How the Afro Vasha Concert went down
author: FRIDAH NALIAKA
description: Afro Vasha concert saw Kenyan artists perform live in an event headlined by Tanzanian star Alikiba.
articleBody:
The Afro Vasha was one rare incident where a music concert is taken out of the City.

The concert that was held on Saturday night saw Kenyan artists perform live in an event headlined by Tanzanian star Alikiba.

The concert held at Lake Naivasha resort saw Kenyan artists such as Femi One, Maandy, Willy Paul, Arrow Bwoy, Otile Brown thrill fans with live performances of their favourite songs.

Afro Vasha will be ongoing today, with Tanzania's Harmonize being the guest artist.

This second part which going down today, will see artists such as Nameless, Wahu, Iyanii, Ssaru give live performances.

headline: Kings of music: Sauti Sol rule the night at Sol Fest (Photos)
author: GRACE KERONGO
description: If Sauti Sol are not luring you to love their worldview on romance and life, they are convincing you with their melody that they are the real deal.
articleBody:
If there is a group of men who have discovered a way into Kenyan's psych and hearts, it has to be Sauti Sol. They have cemented their position as African's sons of music chemistry.

If they are not luring you to love their worldview on romance and life, they are convincing you with their melody that they are the real deal. And indeed they are the real deal after they took the stage on December 12, 2021, in a sold-out concert dubbed Sol Fest.

They are the first-ever Kenyan band to host a sold-out concert with no headlining international artiste.

The packed concert at the Carnivore saw other Sol Generation stars wow the audience like Bensol and Nviiri the Storyteller.

Nviiri performed with an all-female band. What a statement!

Other acts that graced the event include Only Rosa, Maandy, Femi One and Wakadinali.

Later on in the evening, Saut Sol was expected to take the stage at midnight. But they were delayed. The audience chanted their name. 20 minutes later they were still not on stage.

The MC tried to calm the impatient revellers down saying they have a small technical hitch. The audience did not want to hear any of it.

Their fans got impatient, and they booed. Loudly and for a long time.

At 12:28, obliging them Sauti Sol took the stage belting out the enchanting Midnight Train song. The audience was transported to tranquil Zion and the booing was replaced with loud cheers.

headline: Sheng is not indicipline - Wizo Tano Nane defends viral GSU recruits
author: GRACE KERONGO
description: Wizzo Tano Nane is not happy that they have been punished for expressing themselves in sheng.
articleBody:
Rapper Wizzo Tano Nane famed for the Kwani Ni Kesho street lingo has come out to defend 23 newly graduated recruits of the General Service Unite that were punished for shooting a celebratory video in sheng.

In the video, the members of Squad 26 can be seen celebrating and chanting various threats.

"Ndio hiyo tushamaliza. Tunawakilisha hii ni nini? Hii ni red berets. Tunakuja inje. Hawa ni wale wazii," one said signalling shooting a gun.

In a statement, the National Police Service wrote, " We wish to clarify and assure the public that the behaviour portrayed in the clip is not acceptable and does not reflect the values of the GSU, KPS and the NPS.

It continued," The remarks as made in the clip are therefore regrettable and stand condemned. An internal review is ongoing with a view of preferring appropriate measures regarding the incident.

GSU is renowned for its focused training aimed at producing highly disciplined and responsible officers."

Wizzo Tano Nane is not happy that they have been punished for expressing themselves in sheng.

"National Police Service Kenya, what you did was wrong, ni umbwakni sareni hizo jo," he said, "What did the GSU officers do, if someone communicates in sheng, does it translate to indiscipline?"

Wizzo continued,"Sheng is the new culture, we need to understand our youth and resonate with them even the students will stop burning down schools. Enzi za mabongo kuongea kama wakale zimepitwa na wakati manze."

He added,"Those youth were communicating to criminals out there, telling them their time is up, in a language they will understand. And that language is sheng. I don't see anything wrong with that video."

He noted, "On the other hand, it was their winning season, and if it is your winning season, it will not have kelele?"

It was reported that the entire squadron, comprising 23 officers including the ones who were captured in the clip, was banished to the notorious Magadi Field Training camp for another “re-training” as punishment for their indiscretions.

Other officials said the team is likely to be deployed to the general duties after their new “graduation” likely to happen in weeks.

The Magadi Field Training Camp is described as “hell on earth” and considered the ultimate test for endurance within the disciplined forces.

Many officers fear it.

headline: Pastor filmed crossdressing in TV show speaks
author: AFP
description: Church officials couldn't find anything against dressing as a woman in the bible, nor the United Methodist Book of Discipline, but threw the book at him anyway.
articleBody:
A US pastor who made a brief television appearance in drag, wearing a huge pink wig and sequined leotard, has been removed from his ministry, a local church official in Indiana said Wednesday.

Wearing high-heeled thigh boots, lipstick and purple eyeshadow and with a crucifix around his neck, Craig Duke, 62, made a big splash on the HBO show "We're Here," at least among his horrified parishioners.

The Methodist reverend described the appearance as "an incredibly wonderful, refreshing, deepening, powerful spiritual experience," in an interview with the Religion News Service.

But he quickly found himself in hot water with his flock.

Having received "numerous calls and emails that are highly critical of Craig’s actions," Mitch Gieselman, the district superintendent of the church in Evansville, Indiana, said he had decided to relieve Duke of pastoral duties and "significantly reduced" his salary.

But Gieselman said he had not been fired nor had he resigned.

"He has not been found to have committed any chargeable offense or other violation of the United Methodist Book of Discipline," Gieselman said in a letter to parishioners.

Contacted by AFP on Wednesday, Gieselman declined to make any further comments.

The pastor's fate caused a surge of emotion, sparking an online fundraiser that raised nearly $60,000 in donations on Wednesday.

"May the bridge of understanding and acceptance of the LGBTQ community continue to expand across our community and beyond as God's love shines through," the pastor and his partner Linda said in a statement.

He did not regret his moment in the spotlight.

"I was surrounded and immersed in a culture that I've never been immersed in, and one of the things in ministry, if you want to involve people different than yourself in your ministry, you have to go to where people different than you are," he said.

headline: Sports champion Julius Yego speaks out on police murder-suicide
author: GRACE KERONGO
description: King of Kenyan Javelin Julius Yego has raised an alarm over the rampant cases of murder-suicide among members of the disciplined forces.
articleBody:
King of Kenyan Javelin Julius Yego has raised an alarm over the rampant cases of murder-suicide among members of the disciplined forces. Yego is himself a member of the National Police Service (NPS).

"It's been a tough and rough last few months or so seeing my fellow NPS officers mostly juniors taking their lives after killing their fellow colleagues and even civilians, it is very disheartening and disgusting," Yego said in a candid post.

"Something urgent is needed now, not tomorrow to stop this thing now, it's now," adding, "Many lives will be lost if nothing is done to bring this menace to an abrupt halt with long term solving policy within and outside the service."

The sports champion noted that "Mental issues now is a global issue among youths mostly and even old generation and its a fact. We also MUST teach and tell this young generation that life is God-given and sacred and must be preserved and taken care of and that no one is allowed by any laws to take it away from one another or take yours too."

He continued, "When issues of love and family arise, they should be equipped to solve them amicably and in a way accepted to each one of you in that partnership/ association. Family is sacred too and you must protect it always. Condolences to the lost lives this far #ownopinion."

This comes after a police conctable took his own life due to biting financial strain and other issues.

6 people shot by a Kabete cop on a suicide mission

And in the process, Imbatu stepped out with his gun blazing and felled five other people including two bodaboda riders and his neighbours in ...
Crime
1 week ago

A Police Constable at Chaani, Mombasa hangs himself, leaves a detailed letter to his boss and family of what he expects after his death. pic.twitter.com/iGsPIqMzvX

— Lord Abraham Mutai (@ItsMutai) December 10, 2021

Meanwhile, a police officer committed suicide in Eldoret by locking himself in his house and setting it ablaze.

The officer identified as Sergeant Sammy Chirchir was based in Lodwar but had a home at Maili Nne in Eldoret where his family leaved.

Uasin Gishu county police commander Ayub Gitonga said the officer sent away his four year old child before locking himself in the house.

He lit fire on a mattress which caused a gas cylinder to explode. He was burned beyond recognition and Gitinga said the incident was being investigated.

headline: Video: Woman proposes to partner by faking an injury
author: Mpasho News
description: I didn't suspect a thing, and when she went down injured I was obviously really worried about her.
articleBody:
This is the cute moment a woman proposed to her partner by faking an injury on the softball pitch.

Sara Riou and Jacinta Comande have been dating for two years and wanted to make their proposal one to remember.

With the help of friends and loved ones, Sara popped the question right in the middle of a league match at Mirrabooka softball complex in Perth, Western Australia.

Then, around halfway through the match, Sara fell to the ground, pretending to be injured, prompting Jacinta to run on the field.

The video shows Sara getting up on one knee, and asking Jacinta to marry her.

The players and the crowd then burst into applause as the couple share a hug.

Jacinta, from Perth, Western Australia, said: "Sara had told me it was this huge game and that she'd invited all our friends and family down to watch.

"I didn't suspect a thing, and when she went down injured I was obviously really worried about her.

"I ran over and that's when she proposed - I was so surprised and it was such a special moment.

"It was really strange because after it happened they carried on and finished the match, and I walked back to the stands as an engaged woman.

"She really pulled it out of the bag and I can't wait to spend the rest of my life with her."

The video was filmed on December 2.

headline: 3 things that don't deserve to be normalized but are slowly being normalized
author: RACHEL BETTY
description: There are things that were frowned upon in the past but seem to be getting normalised as the days go by.I have compiled a list on some
articleBody:
There are things that were frowned upon in the past but seem to be getting normalised as the days go by.

I have compiled a list on some of those things below;

Weed

It’s all fun and games until you can’t go a day without it.

What’s even worse is that public figures publicly admitting that they use this herb not realizing the amount of damage they can cause.

Them openly and proudly talking about weed can make matters worse for those who might have even become addicts which is worse.

Away from that, I have a personal experience while mingling with my fellows. You might be asked what you do for fun and the options they give you are always two. It's either drinking or smoking week.

If you say no to either of the two, the response can cause shame. “Then what do you with your life?’’

Cheating in relationships

Both genders are guilty of cheating anyways. It almost seems like there is no solution for it. Cases of having sponsors or a mubaba or mama wa Harrier are just a few examples that make people assume cheating is normal and it's okay.

They seem normal because the majority are smiling when such topics come up.

Gossip

Many will justify it by saying that the same way they are gossiping about the subject person is the same way people will gossip about them, so it’s equalised. Some will say as long as it is facts it isn't gossip.

These are the few shady excuses the person gossiping will make just to validate themselves which is in simple terms just sugar-coating the bitter truth.

headline: Moses Kuria to undergo stem cell surgery after electric mat incident
author: TRACY MUTINDA
description: Moses Kuria revealed that he will be among the pioneers to undergo the stem cell surgery in the world.
articleBody:
Gatundu South MP Moses Kuria is set to undergo stem cell surgery in Dubai.

This comes after the MP's feet exploded after standing on an electric mat for four hours, sustaining third-degree burns.

Speaking to Capital FM on Tuesday, Kuria revealed that he will be among the pioneers to undergo the stem cell surgery in the world.

“I am scheduled for stem cell surgery this week. This is a rare surgery and I will be among the pioneers to undergo it in the world,” he said.

Kuria had acquired the electric mat and blanket through a Murang'a MCA friend as a solution to what he said was numbness in his feet.

In October, it emerged that the company behind Kuria’s electric mat was banned in Texas over cancer cure claims.

The company-Ceragem Limited is also operating in the country as a healthcare provider without Pharmacy and Poisons Board approval as required by the law.

He also demanded to know why the company which was banned in Texas for making claims that it can cure cancer is being allowed to operate freely in the country.

“Their products were banned in Texas for fraudulently making claims of curing cancer,” the Gatundu South MP said from his hospital bed.

“The company must take responsibility, I have contacted DCI and the criminal process is taking place.”

The company which has been in operations for 14 years in the country has shops in Nairobi, Thika, Mombasa, Eldoret, Murang’a, Eastleigh and Garissa.

headline: Ida Odinga makes entrance, slays in baby blue at Kasarani event (Photos)
author: GRACE KERONGO
description: Raila Odinga's family made an entrance at the Azimio la Umoja event hosted at Kasarani.
articleBody:
Today is Raila Odinga's big day.

His family made an entrance at the Azimio la Umoja event hosted at Kasarani.

The ODM leader's wife, Ida Odinga, walked into the venue dressed in a baby blue African print get-up.

This look was completed with a scarf draped on her left shoulder of the same color.

Raila's firstborn daughter Rosemary also attended the event dressed in a royal blue dress and black coat.

headline: MP Caleb Kositany's daughter engaged in colourful traditional ceremony (Photos)
author: FRIDAH NALIAKA
description: Stacey Kositany is set to get married to Sam Chelang'a, who is a son of Linah Jebii Kilimo.
articleBody:
Stacey Kositany, the daughter of Soy Member of Parliament Caleb Kositany is off the market.

Stacey was engaged to her fiancee' Sam Chelang'a on Saturday in a colorful traditional wedding at her Soy home.

The event was graced by leaders such as First lady Rachael Ruto, Kapseret MP Oscar Sudi, Nelson Koech among others.

Stacey Kositany is set to get married to Sam Chelang'a, who is a son of Linah Jebii Kilimo, the Chief Administrative Secretary for the State Department for Gender.

Here are photos of the exclusive event.

headline: I love this man, Jalango, with all my being - Amina Chao
author: GRACE KERONGO
description: I stand in front of you as his better half. I love him with everything part of my being. And I am going to stand behind him until the odds fall in our favor - Amina Chao
articleBody:
Amina Chao has for the first time spoken out about her famous husband Jalango - real name Phelix Odiwuor.

Speaking during a fundraiser for Jalango's political campaign, Amina thanked the boys club for showing up.

"We are very privileged to have you in this space. You are not just our friends but a family. You who stand with us when we need you at such a moment don't just deserve the title of a friend but family."

She continued, "I stand in front of you as his better half. I love him with everything part of my being. And I am going to stand behind him until the odds fall in our favor on that day the 9th of August 2022.

Until he is pronounced the next MP of Langata constituency."

Amina then explained why Jalango is the best choice for the Langata seat, "This man here, I would just like to tell you a bit about him.

Growing up he was not so privileged he didn't come from those families that are well off. Many a times he has told me stories where he has gone to school - I'm sorry to say this - butt naked with just a long shirt."

Adding,"Many times he was sent home from school because he hadn't paid school fees. And he had to go to school without shoes.

This guy has a lot of shoes right now? So you can imagine why? And just looking at who he has turned out to be you can basically say his experiences have shaped him."

She continued, "You can basically say that his experiences have shaped him to be who he is right now he is so kind he's got so much dignity he's so hard-working and I think these are the leaders we are looking out for, not just for Langata but for the whole of Kenya.

It is time for us to vote in a new lot of fresh leaders who are visionary leaders who have purpose leaders who are forward-looking."

headline: 'SGR loses 2 million shillings daily,' - Wanjiru Gikonyo
author: PENINAH WAMBUI
description: "If the government is not able to pay that China loan, China will take over the port's operations."- Wanjiru Gikonyo
articleBody:
It has now emerged that the SGR is losing Ksh 200 million per day.

This is despite Kenya being overwhelmed by loans taken from different countries.

During an interview with Kamene and Jalango on the Morning Kiss, TISA National Coordinator Wanjiru Gikonyo said

"It was recently discovered that the government has used the Kenyan ports in Mombasa. If the government is not able to pay that China loan, China will take over the port's operations. They did that in Zambia, the people were forced to kick out their president."

headline: Kamene Goro: I want Nyashinki's mwakenya on how to keep things private
author: PENINAH WAMBUI
description: "There are very few details of the wedding, his ruracio was also very quiet, Nyashinki has won the master of privacy title." - Kamene Goro
articleBody:
Kamene Goro has commended Nyashinski for managing to keep his personal life private.

This was after he had a white wedding last week and Kenyans only got to know about it after the wedding photos were leaked on social media.

Speaking during the Morning Kiss, she said,

"Why is it that men become attractive when they are off the market?. Personally, I would not want to date a married man. Nyashinki got married and ladies were crying on his timeline saying their boo is gone.

There are very few details of the wedding, his ruracio was also very quiet, Nyashinki has won the master of privacy title. I would want his mwakenya."

Kamene called out fellow celebrities for continuously exposing their dirty laundry in public.

"This past month celebrities have been exposing each other, sometimes I cringe and say 'usiseme hiyo.'

Everybody has been airing their dirty laundry in public, guys are saying it's good to remain relevant.

People are putting themselves there so much while others have put themselves private and they are still relevant."

headline: Willy Paul to sue for Ksh 96m in damages over attempted rape claims
author: GRACE KERONGO
description: Pozze calculated the damages over the sexual assault claims to be worth millions.
articleBody:
Anyhow, he has released a press statement saying he is not playing around with anyone and especially anyone out to ruin his brand, Willy Paul.

"WILLY PAUL is not Wilson Ouma, WILLY PAUL is a BRAND NAME with commercial interests both locally and Abroad. I, therefore, issue this statement as a STERN WARNING that there will be Serious Legal Consequences both individually and collectively to whoever might purport to give false unsubstantiated claims," the statement read.

The statement was issued due to rumours of more girls planning to come out to accuse Pozze of harassment.

It read in part,"It has come to my ATTENTION that a number of ladies have been handed scripts by one D and crew, the said ladies have been promised money among other gifts in order to come forward and CLAIM THAT I ASSAULTED THEM. I CANNOT and WILL NOT CONDONE such kind of claptrap aimed at tarnishing my good name."

Pozze also claimed he isa victim of cyberbulling.

"CYBERBULLYING is a Criminal Offense Punishable by Law, I CANNOT and WILL NOT sit back and watch my Constitutional Rights being Violated, I will fight to the end to see that justice is served. I cannot take away your Freedom of Expression but such Freedom must be exercised with Regard to other People's right to DIGNITY."

He noted, "BE ADVISED: THAT while you Pursue your clout chase aimed at uplifting your social Profiles using my name, Willy Paul is a Business Brand that is losing Financially! These losses will be paid by you in Your individual Capacity. We shall go to court and Sort out this NONSENSE once and for all. I have had enough of these games that threaten my career and Violate my Rights!"

Pozze calculated the damages to be worth millions.

Thank you very much. You've won," he told his detractors.

headline: Hapa ni mbwe mbwe! CS Matiang'i declares Monday a public holiday
author: ELIZABETH NGIGI
description: the government will hold the celebrations on the said day but the country will have a holiday on Monday in line with the Constitution.
articleBody:
Interior CS Fred Matiang'i has declared Monday, December 13 a public holiday to mark Jamhuri Day.

In a statement, Interior Cabinet Secretary, Fred Matiang'i, stated that since Jamuhuri Day will fall on Sunday, December 12, the government will hold the celebrations on the said day but the country will have a holiday on Monday in line with the Constitution.

"It is hereby confirmed that 13th December 2021 will be a public holiday, by dint of Jamhuri Day falling on Sunday 12th December 2021," Matiang'i said.

"This day bears profound historical significance as it marks the attainment of Kenya’s independence and the birth of the Republic."

The Interior CS called on Kenyans to honour and celebrate the day in a manner that promotes unity, national cohesion and economic progress in the country.

headline: A dive into Seth Gor’s sense of style
author: RACHEL BETTY
description: Actor and comedian Seth Gor stands out as one of the most stylish male content creators. Here are a few samples of Gor’s outfits1. Peaky blinders reloaded Seth gave vintage mafia vibes when he pulled off this look and he was looking smitten in it. He pulled off the Character Cillian Murphy played paying attention to every detail even the vintage clock hanging in his vest.
articleBody:
Actor and comedian Seth Gor stands out as one of the most stylish male content creators.

Here are a few samples of Gor’s outfits1.

Peaky blinders reloaded

Seth gave vintage mafia vibes when he pulled off this look and he was looking smitten in it.

He pulled off the Character Cillian Murphy played paying attention to every detail even the vintage clock hanging in his vest.

A post shared by Seth Gor (@seth_gor)

2. El Chapo on a safari

In this outfit, his shirt and hat are just giving Pablo Escobar essence since such pairing is very famous among Mexican people.

A post shared by Seth Gor (@seth_gor)

3. Velvet on velvet

This emerald green two-piece set stands out because it is velvet.

Pairing it with a white vest and white sneakers compliments the entire outfit perfectly.

A post shared by Seth Gor (@seth_gor)

4. Sleeve garter revival

Sleeve garters were very famous in the 19th century. They allow individuals to customize sleeve lengths and keep their cuffs from becoming soiled while working or at the correct length when worn under a jacket.

Seth took a chance with these and emerged successful without a doubt. Cillian Murphy’s character also pulled off this look in the famous series peaky blinders. Guess our very own Duke of Kendu bay may be inspired by him.

Seth clearly takes his sense of style very seriously which could be the reason for him executing his style with a bang.

As he says , “Style is a deeply personal expression of who you are, and every time you dress, you are asserting a part of yourself. #DukeOfKenduBay.’’

headline: List of bigwigs at Raila's Kasarani bash
author: GRACE KERONGO
description: All eyes are currently on the ongoing Azimio la Umoja event at Kasarani. The VIPs are arriving one after the other.
articleBody:
All eyes are currently on the ongoing Azimio la Umoja event at Kasarani. The VIPs are arriving one after the other.

Of course, they are dressed to the nines for the big day.

The crowd management has brought about an issue as the entrance reserved for VIPs turned chaotic despite the presence of heavy security.

Supporters of various political leaders crowded the entrance to some point that they blocked entry to the main stadium.

The entrance was meant to be of VIPs alone but some arrived with supporters making it almost impossible for the security to turn them away.

The security team was however alert as some of the supporters turned out to be also thieves who were on a looting spree.

At some point, the pickpockets and thieves were caught by the police after a section of the supporters alerted the security officers.

At this juncture, the Maasai dancers and singers who had aligned themselves to usher in guests were forced to cut short their performance.

One thief was caught with four mobile phones and was cuffed and taken to the police station.

Here are some of the popular faces spotted at the Azimio la umoja event.

Francis Atwoli

Gladys Wanga

Babu Owino

Wycliffe Oparanya

Millie Odhiambo

headline: Bahati resurfaces in public after Diana Marua called out Willy Paul, he reacts
author: GRACE KERONGO
description: Bahati has thrown his support behind Diana arua. " As your husband always count on me..."
articleBody:
Singer Bahati has not yet uttered any words regarding the attempted rape claims by his wife, Diana Marua levelled against fellow artiste Willy Paul.

Diana claims that Willy Paul choked and sexually assaulted her in his car but she managed to escape before he could rape her.

Willy Paul released a statement claiming that Bahati and Diana are out to ruin his career and he has never sexually assaulted anyone.

Well, Bahati has been on the news where he has steered clear of the controversy.

Willy Paul finally addresses sexual assault claims by Miss P

Now, he has been accused of attempted rape by Diana Marua who claims that Pozee kidnaped her, locked her in his car, restrained and choked her while ...
Entertainment
5 days ago

Over the weekend he was in Tanzania for Diamond Platnumz' new project dubbed WasafiBet.

Speaking during the launch, Diamond said that WasafiBet project was a way of giving back to the fans for their support.

"Niliamua kufungua WasafiBet kwa ajili ya mashabiki wangu ambao wamekuwa na mimi tangu nianze safari yangu katika ulingo wa burudani, kupitia WasafiBet mashabiki wa michezo tofauti wataweza kuweka bet zao na kujishindia hela

(I decided to open WasafiBet as a way of giving back to my loyal fans who have been with me through thick and thin, through WasafiBet sports fanatics will be able to win big on their various bets)."

Odibets General manager Dedan Mungai said they are happy to partner with Diamond Platinumz and his Wasafi team.

Speaking at the event, Bahati said, "I'm so proud of this moment. When I was coming in, looking at where you have come from my brother you are a big inspiration. Seeing WasafiBet is a dream come true."

Adding, "It is proof that any East African son can rise from any slum any ghetto out there to where Diamond Platnumz is."

Bahati continued, "My brother, this is a big deal as Kenyans we are so proud and that is why we are here. I'm happy you have made us a part of it."

Posting details of Diana's upcoming show, Bahati showed his support for his wife saying, "Just two songs and your calendar is heavily booked 🔥. You are loved and you inspire a lot of women and girls out there!"

Adding, "Dear my beautiful wife @diana_marua as your husband always count on me. I will support you until all your dreams come true 🙏🙏🙏 Go kill tomorrow's show at Avery Lounge, Utawala and make your fans proud 💪🙂."

headline: He left me: Ndogo's first husband suffering
author: GRACE KERONGO
description: On her first love, Nyota Ndogo revealed, "We broke up 15 years ago...he is the one who left me. Out of the respect I have for him and the love for my child I cannot talk about that."
articleBody:
Nyota Ndogo has revealed that her first love left her heartbroken and with a child to raise all by herself. But now, her life is indeed a bed of roses after she met her husband, Danish national Henning Nielsen.

Nyota has revealed that trolls keep reminding her about her past life with her first husband.

"I have come to realise that whenever I post my husband, two or three people come and comment on my post and write long annoying essays. They keep saying that I left my first husband, the father of my first born child. He was also my first love."

Nyota explained, "We broke up 15 years ago. Those close to me, know my story know that he is the one who left me. Out of the respect I have for him and the love for my child I cannot talk about that."

headline: Still in love at 40: Senator Kipchumba Murkomen celebrates wedding anniversary
author: FRIDAH NALIAKA
description: Murkomen shared a picture of their wedding day which was colored in maroon and white.
articleBody:
Elgeyo Marakwet Senator Kipchumba Murkomen celebrated his 12th wedding anniversary with his wife Gladys Wanjiru.

While sharing a picture of their wedding day which was colored in maroon and white, Murkomen wrote,

"12 years of love with my best friend Gladys Wanjiru Kipchumba !"

The Senator has not been shy of flaunting her lovely wife online.

In August, Gladys celebrated her 40th birthday and a sweet Murkomen surprised her with a lavish party.

headline: More women revealing rape cases - Diana Marua defends herself
author: GRACE KERONGO
description: Being a victim of rape is not a joke coz I am one and I have never even told my own parents.
articleBody:
Diana Marua set the interwebs on fire when he revealed that she is a rape survivor.

In a viral video, Diana narrated how Willy Paul attempted to rape her three years ago.

"I have been crying since I opened up in the video; this was simply the worst day of my life and a horror moment to any woman who has come across rape or almost got raped.

I'm still in disbelief that a man can forcefully attempt to rape you but because they've noticed you went silent they still clout chase with your name lying to the public that they have slept with you just for clout."

Adding,"I was silent watching and collecting the needed evidence for the 3 cases I have filed with the Police in court... All these women you have raped and tried to rape are already in my DMs and With the influence, God has given me I will make sure they all get justice.

She continued, "A lot of women have been quiet because he threatens them to know big people in Government wacha sasa tuone. Now it's time we stand for our women. I can't stop crying 😭😭😭 💔💔💔 LET'S MEET IN COURT & STOP A RAPIST!!!"

Willy Paul denied any wrongdoing on his part and put out a statement saying he will fight to clear his name in court.

Here are some reactions from netizens.

aminaabdirabar: Oh no...I’m so sorry Dee😢😢 the fact that people would think this is kiki is so sad. My heart goes out to you. No one should ever experience that. 😔

phoinahaircollection: Healing is your potion my love 😞😞

immaculate_njiru: My thoughts👇 I think Diana Bahati moved on after the incidents for peace to reign but willy Paul decided to keep insulting her till she could no hold it anymore. Being a victim of rape is not a joke coz I am one and I have never even told my own parents. It is not easy to come out and talk coz the trauma is real. I understand dee very well. May God shine a light for you to find justice😢#justicefordianabahati.

cateodera: All those people who are here to condemn a woman who has been publicly sharing her life and has now decided to open up about a painful incident, please just shut up and keep scrolling.

You don’t know what she’s been through and her speaking up against an alleged perpetrator is going to help those of us who care about our little sisters and daughters.

Don’t be afraid @diana_marua we shall stand with you, because no one is safe until all women are safe. Godspeed and I wish you and the other women healing in your ordeal.

I'm still in disbelief that a man can forcefully attempt to rape you but because they've noticed you went silent they still clout chase with your name lying to the public that they have slept with you just for clout."

Adding, "I was silent watching and collecting the needed evidence for the 3 cases I have filed with the Police in court... All these women you have raped and tried to rape are already in my DMs and With the influence, God has given me I will make sure they all get justice.

She continued, "A lot of women have been quiet because he threatens them to know big people in Government wacha sasa tuone. Now it's time we stand for our women. I can't stop crying 😭😭😭 💔💔💔 LET'S MEET IN COURT & STOP A RAPIST!!!"

Willy Paul denied any wrongdoing on his part and put out a statement saying he will fight to clear his name in court.

Here are some reactions from netizens.

aminaabdirabar: Oh no...I’m so sorry Dee😢😢 the fact that people would think this is kiki is so sad. My heart goes out to you. No one should ever experience that. 😔

phoinahaircollection: Healing is your potion my love 😞😞

immaculate_njiru: My thoughts👇 I think Diana Bahati moved on after the incidents for peace to reign but willy Paul decided to keep insulting her till she could no hold it anymore. Being a victim of rape is not a joke coz I am one and I have never even told my own parents. It is not easy to come out and talk coz the trauma is real. I understand dee very well. May God shine a light for you to find justice😢#justicefordianabahati.

cateodera: All those people who are here to condemn a woman who has been publicly sharing her life and has now decided to open up about a painful incident, please just shut up and keep scrolling.

You don’t know what she’s been through and her speaking up against an alleged perpetrator is going to help those of us who care about our little sisters and daughters.

Don’t be afraid @diana_marua we shall stand with you, because no one is safe until all women are safe. Godspeed and I wish you and the other women healing in your ordeal.

headline: Ma odi wa serikali: Viral GSU celebratory video gets new recruits in trouble
author: GRACE KERONGO
description: In the video, the GSU members of Squad 26 can be seen celebrating and chanting various threats.
articleBody:
A viral video of fresh General Service Unit recruits celebrating the completion of their training left many uneasy.

In the video, the members of Squad 26 can be seen celebrating and chanting various threats.

"Ndio hiyo tushamaliza. Tunawakilisha hii nini? Hii ni red berets. Tunakuja inje. Hawa ni wale wazii," one said signalling shooting a gun.

In a statement, the National Police Service wrote, "Attention of the NPS is drawn to a video clip circulating on social media depicting newly graduated GSU officers recording themselves as they make some irresponsible and reckless remarks.

We wish to clarify and assure the public that the behaviour portrayed in the clip is not acceptable and does not reflect the values of the GSU, KPS and the NPS.

It continued,"All graduands went through a rigorous value-based training modelled on democratic policing principles and designed to make them responsive and responsible officers of the law at the service of citizens.

The oath of allegiance they took as part of their graduation is a testament to the sanctity of their duty to service.

The remarks as made in the clip are therefore regrettable and stand condemned. An internal review is ongoing with a view of preferring appropriate measures regarding the incident.

GSU is renowned for its focused training aimed at producing highly disciplined and responsible officers."

Check out the video below.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Mpasho News (@mpashogram)

headline: RIP! Gideon Moi's mother-in-law is dead
author: FRIDAH NALIAKA
description: The mother of Zara Moi died on Thursday morning.
articleBody:
Afia Juma, the mother of Baringo Senator Gideon Moi's wife Zara is dead.

In a statement on his social media, Gideon mourned the family matriarch who he described as a humble and strict mum.

"I saddened by the passing on of Mama Afia Juma - mother to my wife Zara Moi. She was a humble, introspective yet strict mother-in-law. May Allah rest her soul in peace," he wrote.

In a press statement, KANU Secretary- General Nick Salat said the mother of Zara Moi died on Thursday morning.

"The passing away early today of Mama Afia Juma, the mother to Zara Moi who is the wife of our National Chairman, is indeed devastating," read part of a statement from Salat.

He added,

headline: Alfred Mutua explains why he will give 500k- 1 Million to newlyweds
author: FRIDAH NALIAKA
description: Mutua said his intention is to enable couples to settle down easily and focus on growing their families.
articleBody:
Machakos Governor Alfred Mutua sparked public debate after releasing his presidential manifesto on Sunday, December 5.

One proposal in his manifesto was to give newly-weds Ksh 500,000 to 1 Million to establish themselves.

In an interview with Kiss 100, Mutua explained his reasons for gifting newlyweds.

"This is an idea that is coming from the concept of enabling people to own homes. We need to encourage families to have homes, and make it easier for people to own homes," he said.

He added that his intention is to enable couples to settle down easily and focus on growing their families.

Additionally, he revealed plans to reduce the cost of construction materials.

"When you get married and want to have a home... you apply to the government we give you your initial 500,000 - 1 million shillings to put as a down payment. Kazi yako ni kujifurahisha na kuzaa...an kulea watoto. Then you pay the government over a period of 20 years," Mutua said.

The money, he said, will not be used for planning the wedding or any other investment.

headline: Trio Mio to grace Raila Odinga's big event on Friday (Video)
author: FRIDAH NALIAKA
description: Trio will be among one of the young artists who will entertain guests drawn from Kenya and International delegates.
articleBody:
Teen singer Trio Mio is set to grace Raila Odinga's mega-event at Kasarani Stadium on Friday, December 10.

Trio will be among one of the young artists who will entertain guests drawn from Kenya and International delegates.

In a message on his social media, the ODM Party leader invited other Kenyans to turn up for the Azimio la Umoja National Convention like Trio Mio.

"Trio Mio amecheza kama yeye, nanyi chezeni kama nyinyi #TukutaneKasa," he wrote.

The 'Sipangwingwi' hitmaker also invited Kenyans to turn up for Raila Odinga's event.

"This week on Friday, i will be at Kasarani in a function of none other than Baba (Raila). Come and listen to the big announcement that he is going to reveal that special day. Kama kawa, yeye hapangwingwi...yeye ndio hupangana," Trio Mio said.

headline: Vijana tuomoke! Alfred Mutua speaks on his presidential plan for creatives
author: FRIDAH NALIAKA
description: "In every County, we will set up recording studios..let people record music and films free of charge." - Alfred Mutua
articleBody:
Machakos Governor Alfred Mutua has spoken about his presidential ambition and the plans he has in store.

In an interview on Kiss 100, Mutua said he aims at amplifying the voices of youths and the less fortunate.

" The issue of having only a few billionaires and millions who are poor is not good. It is time to change the narrative so that we can also live quality lives like our agemates in developed nations," he said.

The Machakos Governor also divulged what made him decide to contest for the presidency.

"I love to be in a position where I can change lives. I grew up very poor, left school because of lack of school fees...I know what it means to suffer. I later got an opportunity to go to the USA, I knew what it is to live a quality life. I feel Kenyans have been shortchanged for many years, it is our time to shine," he explained.

Mutua, who is a film enthusiast also shared that his plan is to give a conducive platform for creatives in Kenya.

"In every County, we will set up recording studios..let people record music and films free of charge. Right now all international films are being filmed in South Africa. In Kenya, creatives are frustrated with many procedures," he said.

The Presidential aspirant supported a campaign by comedian Eric Omondi to have more than 75 per cent local content played in the media.

The Governor said that his

On Sunday, Mutua launched his presidential manifesto which entailed;

1. Double the Economy Each year by 11%

2. Create 10 Million Jobs for Youths in 5 Years

3. Ensure Smooth Business Environment to Attract Investors

4. Fight Corruption and Jail all Cartels

5. Ensure Free Healthcare and Education to All.

headline: Proposals in Alfred Mutua's manifesto that have sparked debate online
author: FRIDAH NALIAKA
description: One of his proposals that sparked debate is to give newlyweds half a million to establish their homes.
articleBody:
Machakos Governor Alfred Mutua launched his 2022 manifesto on Sunday, December 5.

In the list of things that Alfred Mutua promised to do if elected Kenya's fifth president, there are some that caused a social media frenzy.

One of his proposals that sparked debate is to give newlyweds half a million to establish their homes. This, he said is payable in 20 years.

Kenyans on Twitter sparked debate on whether this idea is applicable in Kenya.

Another proposal is to have employees pay their staff twice a month instead of the normal monthly salaries.

“I want us to introduce economics of broadening the base by paying our employees twice a month to increase circulation. That way, people can manage their money,” he said.

This has also sparked debate on whether it can be applicable given the country's economic situation.

Another proposal that sparked debate is having swimming pools in every county.

headline: Former KTN host Jamal Gaddafi to run for Malindi MP seat
author: KNA by Emmanuel Masha
description: Jamali Gaddafi, 35, declared his bid for the seat that has already attracted seven other contestants while attending a religious function in Malindi town Monday.
articleBody:
A former journalist with the Kenya Television Network (KTN) has joined the crowded race for the Malindi Parliamentary seat currently held by outspoken legislator Aisha Jumwa.

Jamali Gaddafi, 35, declared his bid for the seat that has already attracted seven other contestants while attending a religious function in Malindi town Monday.

Jumwa will not defend the seat as she is seeking to succeed Kilifi Governor Amason Kingi.

Others who have so far declared their candidature for the Parliamentary seat include former MP William Mtengo, Coast Development Authority Chairman Philip Charo, Coast Water Agency Development Authority board member Amina Mnyazi.

Also in the race to succeed Jumwa are Kenneth Karisa of the Karisa Foundation, Kenya Ports Authority Sports Officer Lenox Safari Pande and Jumwa’s political strategist Amir Mugaisi.

Gaddafi, Charo, Mnyazi, Karisa and Pande defected to the Orange Democratic Movement when Party Leader Raila Odinga visited Malindi recently and are expected to fight it out for the party’s ticket while Mtengo and Mugaisi will contest on the newly registered Pamoja African Alliance (PAA) and the United Democratic Alliance (UDA) respectively.

Gaddafi rose to fame in 2015 when he emerged the winner of the KTN Presenter Season Two reality show held at the Standard Media Group Headquarters along Mombasa Road, Nairobi.

Addressing journalists after the function, Gaddafi expressed confidence that the orange party would conduct fair nominations and promised to give his rivals in the party a run for their money.

"I know ODM is a democratic party which will conduct free and fair primaries in which I am confident I will emerge the winner,” he said adding that he would also support whoever wins the party’s ticket for the gubernatorial seat.

He called on the youth to support his bid saying he was one of their own as opposed to the other contestants whom he described as elderly.

“We have for a long time given opportunities to older politicians but this time we want youthful leaders like me who shall defend the interest of our lot,” he said while being flanked by his father, Mr Jamal Sheikh, who has unsuccessfully sought the seat in the past.

Sheikh threw his weight behind the Registrar of Political Parties for declaring that it would deny party losers in party primaries a chance to vie as independent candidates saying the move would strengthen political parties.

He urged his son’s political competitors in ODM to accept defeat and support the winning candidate during the party primaries.

He at the same time castigated Kilifi Governor Amason Kingi for abandoning ODM to form PAA, saying the move was selfish as it was aimed at making him (Kingi) politically relevant after completing his second term as governor.

“What does Kingi think he can do to help his people after completing his gubernatorial terms? His ambitions are driven by selfish political interest PAA is just his personal party,” he said.

headline: "Newly-weds to be given Ksh 500k-Ksh 1 million," Alfred Mutua proposes
author: Rotter Mbuthia
description: Today afternoon, Alfred Mutua launched the manifesto for his 2022 electoral bid for the presidency of Kenya.One of the most
articleBody:
Today afternoon, Alfred Mutua launched the manifesto for his 2022 electoral bid for the presidency of Kenya.

One of the most interesting proposals made by the Machakos governor was that his government would give newly-weds Sh500,000 to Sh1 million in kind, payable in 20 years, to start life.

That wasn't all, the politician had some other lofty promises he made in his proposal. Some of them are below;

1. Double the Economy Each year by 11%

2. Create 10 Million Jobs for Youths in 5 Years

3. Ensure Smooth Business Environment to Attract Investors

4. Fight Corruption and Jail all Cartels

5. Ensure Free Healthcare and Education to All

Some of the other proposals that he launched aimed at the entertainment industry are below:

1 Establishment of production centres in all counties to create more Machawoods.

2. Provide technical support for TV show productions.-

3. Allocation of funds for entertainment industry SMEs.

4. Tax waivers for local and international production.

5. Establishment of innovation centres for designers manufacturers and business people in all counties.

6. Simplified access to credit through youth fund.
